alert.note: Alert for Maricopa; Pinal (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Phoenix (Central Arizona and California Desert)
info.headline: Dust Advisory issued June 21 at 6:11PM MST until June 21 at 7:00PM MST by NWS Phoenix
info.description: ...A DUST ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 700 PM MST FOR MARICOPA AND PINAL COUNTIES... At 610 PM MST, a wall of dust was along a line extending from Casa Grande to Randolph to 6 miles southeast of Coolidge Airport, moving northwest at 30 mph. HAZARD...Less than a mile visibility with strong wind in excess of 30 mph. SOURCE...Trained weather spotters. IMPACT...Hazardous travel. This includes the following highways... AZ Interstate 10 between mile markers 171 and 204. AZ Interstate 8 between mile markers 163 and 178. AZ Route 87 between mile markers 124 and 159. Locations impacted include... Casa Grande, Florence, Coolidge, Maricopa, Queen Creek, Arizona City, La Palma, Blackwater, Chandler Heights, Toltec, Magma, San Tan Valley, Coolidge Airport, Bapchule and Olberg. PRECAUTIONARY/PREPAREDNESS ACTIONS... Blowing dust brings reduced visibility, leading to dangerous driving conditions. If driving, avoid blowing dust if possible. If caught in dense blowing dust, pull off the road, turn off your lights and keep your foot off the brake.
